channel.title: Apps on Vasya Drobushkov
channel.description: Recent content in Apps on Vasya Drobushkov

item.title: Card Soccer
item.description: How to play The goal of the game is to win AI opponent by scoring more goals. The game is turn based. On your turn you should move the “ball” (card opened from your deck) to opponents goal. You start from the row that is close to your goal: you should select a card in a row and if it matches by value or suite - proceed to the next row up until the opponent’s goal.
